law.text: The policy or policies may also provide accidental death and dismemberment insurance and may contain such provisions with respect to the class or classes of employees covered, amounts of insurance for designated classes or groups of employees, terms of eligibility, continuation of insurance after retirement, and such other provisions as the commissioner of insurance may approve.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 27, effective July 15, 2010. -- Repealed and reenacted as KRS 18A.215, 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 42, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 3.
